name: VPCEndpoint
shortDesc: The AWS::EC2::VPCEndpoint resource creates a VPC endpoint that you can use to establish a private connection between your VPC and another AWS service without requiring access over the Internet, a VPN connection, or AWS Direct Connect.

properties.name: PolicyDocument
properties.desc: A policy to attach to the endpoint that controls access to the service. The policy must be valid JSON. The default policy allows full access to the AWS service. For more information, see Controlling Access to Services in the Amazon VPC User Guide.

properties.name: RouteTableIds
properties.desc: One or more route table IDs that are used by the VPC to reach the endpoint.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.desc: The AWS service to which you want to establish a connection. Specify the service name in the form of com.amazonaws.region.service.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.desc: The ID of the VPC in which the endpoint is used.
